name: Checkpoint (Phil Johnson)
description:
I haven't had the chance to do a lot of game making recently, but I very much wanted to participate in this year's NaNoRenO game jam, so I whipped up something quickly to submit to the jam. It's a very short and minimalistic story about a very tired person, and I hope it gives those who read it an opportunity to stop and breathe for a moment.

Music used is Narcissus Smells Like Headache by Monplaisir.

Background image is Campfire, Maine Woods by Frederic Edwin Church.

Thank you for playing, and please be sure to check out other entries to NaNoRenO 2023!
